titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to reduce the interest rates on disaster loans provided by the Small Business Administration for losses resulting from flooding in Midwest communities participating in the national flood insurance program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.subcommittee: SBA Legislation and the General Economy

bill.summary: 7/26/1993--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Act to reduce to one percent per year (currently, varying rates of up to eight percent) the interest rate on the Federal share of disaster loans provided by the Small Business Administration to homeowners and businesses (including agricultural cooperatives) unable to obtain credit elsewhere for losses resulting from flooding in Midwest communities between June 1, 1993, and May 31, 1994, as long as such communities are participants in the national flood insurance program.
